## Description {#details}

Diagnostic information for optimization analysis remarks related to pointer aliasing.

Definition at line 968 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Constructors

### OptimizationRemarkAnalysisAliasing() {#a316fb21374c6a171a407d9d5d64e37be}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::OptimizationRemarkAnalysisAliasing::OptimizationRemarkAnalysisAliasing (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; PassName, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> RemarkName, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diagnosticlocation">DiagnosticLocation</a> &amp; Loc, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; CodeRegion)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
<code>PassName</code> is the name of the pass emitting this diagnostic.

If this name matches the regular expression given in -Rpass-analysis=, then the diagnostic will be emitted. <code>RemarkName</code> is a textual identifier for the remark (single-word, camel-case). <code><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a></code> is the debug location and <code>CodeRegion</code> is the region that the optimization operates on (currently only block is supported). The front-end will append its own message related to options that address pointer aliasing legality.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h/#l00978">978</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<SectionDefinition>

## Private Constructors

### OptimizationRemarkAnalysisAliasing() {#ac00a89f94e316966e5a13fbe4708f5c0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::OptimizationRemarkAnalysisAliasing::OptimizationRemarkAnalysisAliasing (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; PassName, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; Fn, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diagnosticlocation">DiagnosticLocation</a> &amp; Loc, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp; Msg)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
This is deprecated now and only used by the function API below.

<code>PassName</code> is the name of the pass emitting this diagnostic. If this name matches the regular expression given in -Rpass-analysis=, then the diagnostic will be emitted. <code>Fn</code> is the function where the diagnostic is being emitted. <code><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a></code> is the location information to use in the diagnostic. If line table information is available, the diagnostic will include the source code location. <code>Msg</code> is the message to show. The front-end will append its own message related to options that address pointer aliasing legality. Note that this class does not copy this message, so this reference must be valid for the whole life time of the diagnostic.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h/#l01000">1000</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
